TopicTitle: [1.0.5] Radial Heat Shields [No longer in development, going to new, larger mod]

Articles.Content:

**Radial Heat Shields**

Version 1.0 comes bundled with Module Manager and TweakScale.

Source is for the most part, I thought was if you have a plugin your Source is just your license.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-28T22:34:39Z" title="07/28/2015 10:34  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 28, 2015</time> by Guest**
Could you post a few pictures of example craft? I like the idea, but right now I'm not too sure how to put it all to work.
Anyone have pictures of how this is implemented on your spaceplanes? So far I have tried using the heat tiles with FAR and they really screw up my center of lift.

> 
> Could you post a few pictures of example craft? I like the idea, but right now I'm not too sure how to put it all to work.

Currently, I'm working on a new version, with heat shielded wings, etc., so I can't right now. I will include some in the 1.0 release.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Anyone have pictures of how this is implemented on your spaceplanes? So far I have tried using the heat tiles with FAR and they really screw up my center of lift.

Thanks for the bug report. I might have to give them lifting ability. I don't normally use FAR, and in fact never have, but ill get it now to check it out.
Updated to 1.0.5!
Along with a black tile, can you please add a white tile?

I will, but I'm waiting for 1.1 for updating this fully. Thanks for the suggestion!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-12-20T04:00:47Z" title="12/20/2015 04:00  AM" data-short="8 yr">December 20, 2015</time> by Guest**
I'm currently resurrecting this mod with completely new models.  It'll be a little while until there is a new release.

Version 1.0 now has a pre release!  The textures are MUCH better than before, and it uses shared textures.  This means that it uses a lot less RAM.  It is planned to convert the two textures to DDS.  The new release comes bundled with TweakScale, which means less parts are required.  You can download it at the bottom of the OP.

could you add some attachment points...its really hard to add a shield to the bottom (and have it expand to cover the engines) if i can attach it centered (my last craft the shield was slightly off center and the left side of the craft spontaneusly dis-assembled during reentry

> 
> 
> On December 21, 2015 at 10:25 PM, Uthgood said:
> 
> 
> could you add some attachment points...its really hard to add a shield to the bottom (and have it expand to cover the engines) if i can attach it centered (my last craft the shield was slightly off center and the left side of the craft spontaneusly dis-assembled during reentry
> 

The popup shield will include attachment points.  (It already does in the 1.0 pre release.)  If you want to get the 1.0 pre release, use the GitHub link.

Oh wait.  I need to update it.  One minute.

Updated.
